name: The Two Rooms
description:
This is a submission to GMTK Game Jam 2021. A short story driven escape game.

Gameplay

This game has Point and Click segments. Click on something to see something.

Story

You and a person whom you hate are locked in a two separate room by a stranger, the two rooms are connected through a hole. The only way out is to cooperate each other to escape.

Credits

Everything was made by me(Kick14) including visuals , music , code and story.                  This game is made in Renpy. 

If you find bugs or have suggestions to improve the game please make me know in the comments.
